data.name: ChkAppLicence
data.value: "I confirm (for and on behalf of myself or the entity I represent, as the case may be) that I have read, understood and agree to be bound by and comply with the terms of End User Licence Agreement."

data.name: EndUserLicenceAgreement
data.value:

<body lang=EN-GB link=blue vlink=purple>

<div class=WordSection1>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;border:none;
padding:0cm'><b>FIRE ANGEL WI-SAFE GATEWAY - END USER LICENCE AGREEMENT</b></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><b>THIS IS A LEGAL AGREEMENT. PLEASE READ THIS END USER
LICENCE AGREEMENT ("EULA") CAREFULLY BEFORE TICKING THE RELEVANT BOX
AND PROCEEDING. </b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b>THIS EULA: </b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:21.3pt;text-indent:-21.3pt'><span
style='font-family:Symbol'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span></span><b>TELLS YOU INFORMATION ABOUT US;</b></p>

<ul style='margin-top:0cm' type=disc>
 <li class=MsoNormal><b>TELLS YOU THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS RELATING TO THE FIRE
     ANGEL WI-SAFE CONNECT SERVICE ("Service") AND THE SOFTWARE THAT
     IS EMBEDDED IN THE FIRE ANGEL WI-SAFE GATEWAY PRODUCT ("Product
     Software" AND "Product" RESPECTIVELY);</b></li>
</ul>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:21.3pt;text-indent:-21.3pt'><span
style='font-family:Symbol'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span></span><b>PLACES CERTAIN RESPONSIBILITIES ON YOU RELATING TO THE PRODUCT
SOFTWARE. YOUR ATTENTION IS DRAWN PARTICULARLY TO CLAUSE 3, WHICH REQUIRES YOU
TO PROVIDE COPIES OF OUR PRIVACY NOTICE TO PERSONS WHO ARE LIVING AT THE
PREMISES WHERE THE PRODUCT IS INSTALLED. </b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b>BY USING THE PRODUCT, YOU ARE ACCEPTING AND AGREEING TO
THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS SET OUT IN THIS EULA ON BEHALF OF YOURSELF OR THE
ENTITY YOU REPRESENT IN CONNECTION WITH SUCH ACCESS. YOU REPRESENT AND WARRANT
THAT YOU HAVE THE RIGHT, AUTHORITY AND CAPACITY TO ACCEPT AND AGREE TO THE
TERMS AND CONDITIONS SET OUT ON THIS EULA ON BEHALF OF YOURSELF OR THE ENTITY
YOU REPRESENT. </b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b>IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO THE TERMS OF THIS EULA, YOU MAY
NOT USE THE PRODUCT AND YOU SHOULD CEASE AND DESIST FROM USING THE PRODUCT AND
YOU SHOULD UNINSTALL THE PRODUCT FROM YOUR PROPERTY/PREMISES.</b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>In this EULA, "<b>we</b>"<b> </b>"<b>us</b>"<b>
</b>and<b> </b>"<b>our</b>" means Fireangel Safety Technology Limited.
We are a private limited company, registered under the laws of England and
Wales, with company number 3641019 and whose registered address is Bridge
House, 4 Borough Street, London Bridge, London, SE1 9QR, United Kingdom. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b>AGREED TERMS:-</b></p>

<h1>1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>              
</span>The Service and Product Software restrictions</h1>

<h2>1.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>From the date of this EULA (i.e. the date on which you tick the relevant
box, signifying your agreement to this EULA, when prompted to do so) unless and
until the EULA is terminated by you or us in accordance with clause 5 ("<b>Term</b>"), we will provide the Service. The Service will comprise:</h2>

<h3>1.1.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>permitting the Product to be connected to our network and activating the
Product and Product Software when that connection has been established;</h3>

<h3>1.1.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>(after the Product has been connected to the network and the Product and
Product Software have been activated) receiving data from the Product via the
Product Software and storing and hosting that data on our servers;</h3>

<h3>1.1.3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>transferring that data to the entity that installed the Product in your
premises ("<b>Contract Service Provider</b>").  </h3>

<h2>1.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>You may use the Product Software only together with and for the purposes
of using of the Product. Save as provided in this EULA, or the terms of any
open source software licence (in respect of any open source software contained
in the Product Software), you shall not (and you shall not procure, enable,
instruct, encourage or otherwise allow other persons to):</h2>

<h3>1.2.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>use the Product Software (or any part thereof) on any device or computer
other than the Product that you own or control;</h3>

<h3>1.2.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>copy, adapt, reverse engineer, decompile, disassemble, modify,
translate, duplicate, create derivative works from, frame, mirror, republish,
transmit, distribute, merge or make error corrections to the Product Software
in whole or in part, except as permitted by statute or regulation for the
purposes of interoperability;</h3>

<h3>1.2.3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>remove, amend or hide any proprietary or other notices of Fireangel Safety
Technology Limited that are contained in the Product Software;</h3>

<h3>1.2.4.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>rent, lease, dispose of, sub-licence or loan the Product Software (in
whole or part);</h3>

<h3>1.2.5.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>provide, or otherwise make available, the Product Software in any form,
in whole or in part to any person. </h3>

<h1>2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>              
</span>Product Software Updates</h1>

<h2 style='text-indent:0cm'>From time to time, we may develop patches, bug
fixes, updates and other modifications to improve the performance of the
Product Software ("<b>Updates</b>"). Updates may be remotely and
automatically downloaded and installed onto the Product without providing any
notice to you or obtaining any additional consent from you and you hereby
consent to the automatic download and installation onto the Product of such
Updates. If you do not consent to such Updates, you should cease and desist from
using the Product Software (which will prevent you from being able to use the
Product). </h2>

<h1>3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>              
</span>Data Protection compliance - YOUR ATTENTION IS DRAWN PARTICULARLY TO
THIS CLAUSE</h1>

<h2>3.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>If you are not the person living at the premises at which the Product
will be installed (for example, if you lease the property in which the Product
is installed to a third party), you shall:</h2>

<h3>3.1.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span> (within one month of their taking up residence at / occupation of the
premises in question) provide all such persons with a copy of the Privacy Notice
attached to this EULA, in order that we may lawfully collect, hold, process and
transfer the personal data of that person (as described in our
<i>Privacy Notice</i>
and within the meaning of article 4 of the General Data Protection Regulation
(EU 2016/679) ("GDPR")) in the manner and for the purposes described our
<i>Privacy Notice</i>.Upon request, you shall promptly (and in any event
within 5 working days of our request) provide us with documentary evidence,
demonstrating your compliance with your obligations under this clause. You
hereby indemnify us and hold us harmless in respect of all damages, losses,
penalties, fines, costs and/or expenses incurred by us (in each case, whether
direct, indirect, consequential or special) as a result of your failure to
comply with this clause. For the avoidance of doubt, breach of this clause will
constitute a material breach of this EULA.</h3>

<h3>3.1.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>inform us immediately if any person living at the premises at which the
Product will be/has been installed objects to the collection and/or use of
their personal data as described in the said Privacy Notice and you shall
follow any lawful instructions and/or directions we give to you in addressing
that objection (including, without limitation, turning the Product off until
further notice).</h3>

<h1>4.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>              
</span>Limitations of the Product, Product Software and the Service</h1>

<h2>4.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>You acknowledge and accept that we will not (and we give no warranty,
representation, undertaking or assurance that we will): </h2>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>4.1.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>notify any emergency service in the event that
the alarm in your Product is triggered;</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>4.1.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>notify you in the event that we receive data
from the Product, that does or may indicate that the Product/Product Software
is faulty or operating outside its normal parameters. </span></h3>

<h2>4.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>You shall be solely responsible for procuring and maintaining in good
order your own network connections and telecommunications links from your
systems to ours. You recognise that for as long as you fail to comply with the
requirements of this clause 4.2, then we have no obligation to (and no
liability for failing to) provide the Service.</h2>

<h2>4.3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>Any delay or failure of the Service arising from or relating to your
network connections or telecommunications links or caused by the Internet shall
not be our responsibility and we shall have no liability for the same. </h2>

<h1>5.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>              
</span>Termination</h1>

<h2>5.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>You may terminate this EULA and the Service at any time and with
immediate effect by permanently disconnecting the Product from the Internet and
uninstalling the Product.</h2>

<h2>5.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>Without affecting any other right or remedy available, either party may
terminate this EULA and the Service with immediate effect by giving written
notice to the other party if:</h2>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>5.2.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>the other party commits a material breach of any
term of this EULA which breach is irremediable or (if such breach is
remediable) fails to remedy that breach within a period of 14 days after being
notified in writing to do so;</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>5.2.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>the other party repeatedly breaches the terms of
this EULA in such a manner as to reasonably justify the opinion that its
conduct is inconsistent with it having the intention or ability to give effect
to the terms of this EULA;</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>5.2.3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>the other party suspends or ceases, or threatens
to suspend or cease, carrying on all or a substantial part of its business.</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>5.2.4.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>the other party applies for, consents to, or
becomes subject to, the appointment of a receiver, manager or administrative
receiver over any of its property or assets;</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>5.2.5.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>the other party becomes unable, or admits in
writing its inability, to pay its debts as they fall due;</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>5.2.6.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>the other party makes </span>any voluntary
arrangement with its creditors or becomes subject to an administration order or
an administrator is appointed or documents are filed at court for the
appointment of an administrator of that other party, or notice of intention to
appoint an administrator is given by that other party; or</h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>5.2.7.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>the other party goes into liquidation or an
order is made or a resolution is passed for the winding-up of that other party</span><span
lang=EN-US>.</span></h3>

<p class=afterhead3><span lang=EN-US> </span></p>

<h2>5.3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>We may terminate the EULA and the Service at any time 12 months or more after
your Service has been first activated in respect of the Product, by giving you written
notice of the same. You recognise and agree that this is reasonable because the
price of the Product is calculated on the basis that the Service will only be
provided for a limited period of time. </h2>

<h2>5.4.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>Termination or expiry of this EULA and the Service shall not affect any
rights, remedies, obligations or liabilities of the parties that have accrued
up to the date of termination or expiry, including the right to claim damages
in respect of any breach of the EULA which existed at or before the date of
termination.</h2>

<h2>5.5.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>On termination of this EULA and the Service for any reason:</h2>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>5.5.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>all rights granted to you under this EULA shall
cease;</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>5.5.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>you shall cease all activities </span>authorised<span
lang=EN-US> by this EULA,</span><span lang=EN-US> </span><span lang=EN-US>including
your use of the Service</span><span lang=EN-US> ;</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>5.5.3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>you shall immediately and permanently disconnect
and uninstall the Product and certify to us (at our request) that you have done
so.</span></h3>

<h1>6.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>              
</span>Limitation of Liability</h1>

<h2>6.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>This paragraph 6 sets out the entire liability of each party (and
that of each party's officers, employees, agents and/or servants) to the other
in respect of and/or relating to and/or in connection with:</h2>

<h2 style='margin-left:0cm;text-indent:0cm'> </h2>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>6.1.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>any breach of this EULA, howsoever arising;</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>6.1.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>the Service, including any use made of it;</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>6.1.3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>any representation, statement or tortious act or
omission (including negligence) arising under or in connection with this EULA
and/or the Service; and</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>6.1.4.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>any other liability (including non-contractual)
howsoever arising under any legal theory whatsoever, arising under or in
connection with this EULA and/or the Service.</span></h3>

<h2>6.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>Nothing in this EULA shall exclude or limit either party's liability
for:</h2>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>6.2.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>death or personal injury resulting from
negligence; or</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>6.2.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation or willful
default; or</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>6.2.3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>for any other matter for which it would be
unlawful for either party to exclude or limit or attempt to exclude or limit
its liability.</span></h3>

<h2>6.3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span><span lang=EN-US>Subject to clauses </span><span
lang=EN-US>3.1</span><span lang=EN-US> and </span><span
lang=EN-US>6.2</span><span lang=EN-US>, and save in respect of claims that you
have infringed any intellectual property rights in the Product and/or the
Product Software, neither party</span> shall under any circumstances whatsoever
be liable to the other party, whether in contract, tort (including negligence)
or restitution, or for breach of statutory duty or misrepresentation, and/or
otherwise howsoever arising under any legal theory whatsoever, for any of the
following losses (in each case, whether direct or indirect):</h2>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>6.3.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>loss of profit or revenue;</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>6.3.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>loss of reputation or depletion of goodwill;</span></h3>

<h3>6.3.3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>loss of business;</h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>6.3.4.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>loss of contracts or loss of business
opportunity;</span></h3>

<h3>6.3.5.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>loss of anticipated saving;</h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>6.3.6.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>payments (e.g. penalties) due to be paid/paid to
any third party under any contract or arrangement;</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>6.3.7.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>wasted management and/or staff time and/or
office time;</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>6.3.8.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>loss or corruption of data, information or
software;</span></h3>

<h3><span lang=EN-US>6.3.9.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span></span><span lang=EN-US>damage to property (e.g. buildings, </span><span
lang=EN-US>IT or telecommunications systems/networks </span><span lang=EN-US>and/or
possessions), </span></h3>

<p class=afterhead3 style='margin-left:42.55pt'>nor any special, indirect, or
consequential loss. </p>

<h2>6.4.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span><span lang=EN-US>Subject to clauses </span><span
lang=EN-US>3.1</span><span lang=EN-US> and </span><span
lang=EN-US>6.2</span><span lang=EN-US>, and save in respect of claims that you
have infringed any intellectual property rights in the Product and/or the
Product Software,</span><span lang=EN-US> </span>each party's total liability to
the other party, whether in contract, tort (including negligence) or
restitution, or for breach of statutory duty or for misrepresentation and/or
otherwise howsoever arising under any legal theory whatsoever, shall be limited
to GBP £500 (five hundred pounds sterling).</h2>

<h1>7.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>              
</span>Intellectual property rights</h1>

<h2>7.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>You acknowledge that all intellectual property rights in the Product and
the Product Software belong to us or our licensors, and you shall have no
rights in or in respect of the Product or the Product Software other than the
right to use them in accordance with their normal use and the terms of this EULA.</h2>

<h1>8.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>              
</span>Interpretation of this EULA</h1>

<h2>8.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>A reference in this EULA to a <b>person</b> includes a natural person,
corporate or unincorporated body (whether or not having separate legal
personality) and that person's personal representatives, successors and
permitted assigns.</h2>

<h2>8.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>References in this EULA to clauses are to the clauses of this EULA.
Clause headings shall not affect the interpretation of this EULA</h2>

<h2>8.3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>In this EULA, a reference to a statute or statutory provision is a
reference to it as amended, extended or re-enacted from time to time, provided
that, as between the parties, no such amendment, extension or re-enactment
shall apply for the purposes of this agreement to the extent that it would
impose any new or extended obligation, liability or restriction on, or
otherwise adversely affect the rights of, any party. A reference to a statute
or statutory provision includes any subordinate legislation made under that
statute or statutory provision, as amended or re-enacted.</h2>

<h2>8.4.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>Any obligation in this EULA on a party not to do something includes an
obligation not to allow that thing to be done.</h2>

<h2>8.5.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>In this EULA: </h2>

<h3>8.5.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>words in the singular shall include the plural and vice versa;</h3>

<h3>8.5.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>reference to <b>writing</b> or <b>written</b> includes e-mail; and</h3>

<h3>8.5.3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>any words following the terms <b>including</b>, <b>include</b>, <b>in
particular</b>, <b>for example</b> or any similar expression shall be construed
as illustrative and shall not limit the sense of the words, description,
definition, phrase or term preceding those terms.</h3>

<h1>9.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>              
</span>Force Majeure</h1>

<h2>9.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>A party shall not be in breach of this EULA, nor liable for any failure
or delay in performance of any obligations under this EULA (and the time for
performance of the obligations shall be extended accordingly) arising from or
attributable to acts, events, omissions or accidents beyond its reasonable
control ("<b>Force Majeure Event</b>"), including but not limited to
any of the following:  </h2>

<h3 style='margin-left:94.6pt'>9.1.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>acts of God, including but not limited to fire, flood, earthquake,
windstorm or other natural disaster;</h3>

<h3 style='margin-left:94.6pt'>9.1.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>war, threat of or preparation for war, armed conflict, imposition of
sanctions, embargo, breaking off of diplomatic relations or similar actions;</h3>

<h3 style='margin-left:94.6pt'>9.1.3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>terrorist attack, civil war, civil commotion or riots;</h3>

<h3 style='margin-left:94.6pt'>9.1.4.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>nuclear, chemical or biological contamination or sonic boom;</h3>

<h3 style='margin-left:94.6pt'>9.1.5.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>fire, explosion or accidental damage;</h3>

<h3 style='margin-left:94.6pt'>9.1.6.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>adverse weather conditions; </h3>

<h3 style='margin-left:94.6pt'>9.1.7.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>collapse of building structures, failure of computers or vehicles;</h3>

<h3 style='margin-left:94.6pt'>9.1.8.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>any labour dispute, including but not limited to strikes, industrial
action or lockouts;</h3>

<h3 style='margin-left:94.6pt'>9.1.9.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>         
</span>non-performance by suppliers or subcontractors (other than by companies
in the same group as the party seeking to rely on this sub-clause); and</h3>

<h3 style='margin-left:94.6pt'>9.1.10.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>       
</span>interruption or failure of utility service, including but not limited to
electric power, telecommunications, including the Internet, gas or water.</h3>

<h2>9.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>          
</span>If the Force Majeure Event prevails for a continuous period of more than
3 months, either party may terminate the EULA by giving 30 days' written notice
to the other party. On the expiry of this notice period, this EULA will
terminate. Such termination shall be without prejudice to the rights of the
parties in respect of any breach of this EULA occurring prior to such
termination.</h2>

<h1><span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>            
</span>Notices</h1>

<h2>10.1.<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>        
</span>Any notice given to a party under or in connection with this EULA shall
be in writing and shall be delivered by hand or by pre-paid first class post or
other next working day delivery service, addressed to its registered office or
its principal place of business or: </h2>

<h3>10.1.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>       
</span>by email to us at <a href="mailto:support@wi-safeconnect.com"><span
style='color:windowtext'>support@wi-safeconnect.com</span></a>;</h3>

<h3>10.1.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>       
</span>by email to you at the email address to us at the time when the Product
was connected to our network.</h3>

<h2>10.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>        
</span>Any notice shall be deemed to have been received:</h2>

<h3>10.2.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>       
</span>if delivered by hand, on signature of a delivery receipt;</h3>

<h3>10.2.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>       
</span>if sent by email, the date the email is sent, provided that the sending
party can produce evidence that the email was correctly addressed and that it
left its systems; or</h3>

<h3>10.2.3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>       
</span>if sent by pre-paid first class post or other next working day delivery
service at 9.00 am on the second business day after posting or at the time
recorded by the delivery service.</h3>

<h2>10.3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>        
</span>This clause does not apply to the service of any proceedings or any
other documents in any legal action.</h2>

<h1>11.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>            
</span>General</h1>

<h2>11.1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>        
</span><b>Entire Agreement. </b>This EULA constitutes the entire agreement
between us relating to its subject matter and supersedes and extinguishes all
previous agreements, promises, assurances, warranties, representations and
understandings between us, whether written or oral, relating to its subject
matter.</h2>

<h2>11.2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>        
</span><b>Non-Reliance. </b>Each party agrees that it shall have no remedies in
respect of any statement, representation, assurance or warranty (whether made
innocently or negligently) that is not set out in this EULA. Each party agrees
that it shall have no claim for innocent or negligent misrepresentation or
negligent misstatement based on any statement in this EULA. Nothing in this document
shall exclude or limit any liability for fraud.</h2>

<h2>11.3.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>        
</span><b>Variation. </b>No amendment or variation of this EULA shall be
effective unless it is in writing and signed by the parties (or their
authorised representatives).</h2>

<h2>11.4.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>        
</span><b>Assignment and other dealings. </b>You may not assign, transfer,
mortgage, charge, subcontract, declare a trust over or deal in any other manner
with any of your rights and obligations under this EULA without our prior written
consent (which we may withhold at our absolute discretion).</h2>

<h2>11.5.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>        
</span><b>Waiver. </b>No failure or delay by a party to exercise any right or
remedy provided under this EULA or by law shall constitute a waiver of that or
any other right or remedy, nor shall it preclude or restrict the further
exercise of that or any other right or remedy. No single or partial exercise of
such right or remedy shall preclude or restrict the further exercise of that or
any other right or remedy.</h2>

<h2>11.6.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>        
</span><b>Severance </b>If any provision or part-provision of this EULA is or
becomes invalid, illegal or unenforceable, it shall be deemed modified to the
minimum extent necessary to make it valid, legal and enforceable. If such
modification is not possible, the relevant provision or part-provision shall be
deemed deleted. Any modification to or deletion of a provision or
part-provision under this clause shall not affect the validity and
enforceability of the rest of this EULA.</h2>

<h2>11.7.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>        
</span><b>Third party rights. </b>No person, other than a party to this EULA,
shall have any rights under or in connection with this EULA. </h2>

<h2>11.8.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>        
</span><b>Governing law. </b>This EULA and any dispute or claim arising out of
or in connection with it or its subject matter or formation (including
non-contractual disputes or claims) shall be governed by and construed in
accordance with the law of England and Wales.</h2>

<h2>11.9.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>        
</span><b>Jurisdiction. </b>Each party irrevocably agrees that the courts of
England and Wales shall have exclusive jurisdiction to settle any dispute or
claim arising out of or in connection with this EULA or its subject matter or
formation (including non-contractual disputes or claims).</h2>
